title: Opposition in AJK already lost: Shibli Faraz
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 24 (APP):Federal Minister for Science and Technology, Shibli Faraz Saturday said that the opposition in Azad Jammu and Kashmir (AJK) has already lost.
Ali Amin is the lion of PTI he neutralised all opposition parties in GB & is going to repeat the feat in AJK tomorrow inshallah. Opposition in AJK has already lost. While NS discussing “ matters of mutual interest”  with enemies of Pakistan in London.“ #WeStandWithAliGandapur
— Senator Shibli Faraz (@shiblifaraz) July 24, 2021
In a tweet, he said that Nawaz Sharif is discussing “matters of mutual interest” with the enemies of Pakistan in London.
Shibli Faraz said that Ali Amin is the lion of Pakistan Tehreek-i-Insaf (PTI).
He neutralised all opposition parties in Gilgit Baltistan and is going to repeat the feat in AJK tomorrow inshAllah, the minister said.
